output

public function output()

Shuffle incoming stuff into the text display field.  Once we’ve shored everything up and made sure there are no inadvertant calls to output being made, I’m REASONABLY happy to throw some indirection in here, and redirect output() to codexOutput() if the codex is the active module.  Maybe.
